item.description: The Realm is in need of help, and only the boldest heroes need answer the call. The Tree folk have been custodians of the Autumn Wood since before humans traveled to this land, but there are shadows entangling the Forest Heart, and the once-pristine grove is now a haunted place, where yellow-eyed shapes snatch at travelers from behind the sickly trees. Take on the role of a foam sword-wielding fantasy hero in this 2-hour event for ages 8+. Fight the villains, solve the mystery, and save the day!
item.name: Adventure Night: Before the Fall
